title: ISic000098. Honours for an unknown member of the equestrian order
body:
Facsimile Images

[---]io Sex[--- ---]
[equo public]o ((·)) praef(ecto) ((·)) fabṛ(um) [trib(uno) milit(um)]
[le]g(ionis) ((·)) XII F̣[ul]minátae ((·)) pro [legato]
Caesarị[s] Cypri ((·)) praef(ecto) ((·)) c<o>h[ort(is) ---]
5equitátae ( vac. 1)((·)) ( vac. 2)et ( vac. 1)((·)) ( vac. 1)Iulia[e ---]
M(arcus) ((·)) Livius ((·)) Macedonic[us ---]
l(ocus) ((·)) ( vac. 3)[d(atus) d(ecreto) d(ecurionum)]

Apparatus criticus

Text based on autopsy

translation

commentary

The restored text is based upon that proposed by H.G. Pflaum, in Les carrières procuratoriennes équestres sous le Haut-Empire romain (1960-61), vol. 1, p. 7, A(8).
